imdb.plot outline: The Reality Show where normal everyday disputes are settled in the amateur boxing ring. Lawyers, Doctors, Politicians, School Teachers - anyone with a dispute, long standing argument, grudge. It's the People's Court, Meets American Idol, Meets American Ninja Warrior in a Boxing Ring. Take matters into your own hands, legally and in a fun and entertaining way.
imdb.title: Brawl for It All
plot: The Reality Show where normal everyday disputes are settled in the amateur boxing ring. Lawyers, Doctors, Politicians, School Teachers - anyone with a dispute, long standing argument, grudge.
